changes_summary: These commits primarily focus on e-commerce checkout and subscription management improvements across multiple brands (Factor, GoodChop, and pet food services). Major themes include cart/checkout functionality enhancements, delivery options filtering with feature flags, voucher/discount handling, and test maintenance. Several changes involve API integrations, price migrations, and UI refinements for subscription flows.

features.name: Factor Form Multi-Cadence Support
features.description: API integration enabling multiple subscription cadence options for Factor brand

features.name: Factor Form One-Time Purchase (OTP)
features.description: Cart actions and order creation functionality for one-time purchases with V2 Cart ID and subbrand support

features.name: Delivery Options Filtering
features.description: Feature flag-based filtering logic for checkout delivery options and cadences

features.name: Voucher Discount Type Display
features.description: Logic to validate voucher discount_type and display percentage vs dollar amounts appropriately

features.name: OTP Checkout Analytics
features.description: Added OTP attributes to Statsig event tracking for checkout success

features.name: Plans Selection CTA Update
features.description: Updated copy for call-to-action on plans selection

features.name: Recipe Count Update in Funnel
features.description: Updated recipe counting logic in funnel, filtering out custom recipes for multipet scenarios

decisions.what: Use feature flags for delivery options filtering
decisions.rationale: Allows controlled rollout of checkout delivery options and cadence filtering

decisions.what: Implement V2 Cart ID for Factor OTP orders
decisions.rationale: Support new cart architecture with subbrand differentiation

decisions.what: Add RTE subscription filter with fallback voucher
decisions.rationale: Ensure proper voucher handling for RTE subscriptions

decisions.what: Consolidate family types usage and remove topper references
decisions.rationale: Simplify PetsTable implementation and reduce technical debt

decisions.what: Make Whitelabel cart adapter API calls conditional
decisions.rationale: Only call API when arguments are ready to prevent unnecessary requests

refactors.reason: Remove topper references and consolidate family types usage
refactors.impact: Simplified component logic and reduced code complexity
Price display and calculation logic updated
Improved performance and reduced unnecessary network requests

refactors.reason: Ensure non-discounted shipping contains only regular shipping

fixes.issue: Custom recipe filtering in funnel for multipet scenarios

entities.name: Factor
entities.context: Multiple features added including OTP, multi-cadence, cart actions, and subscription filters

entities.name: GoodChop
entities.context: Price migration, shipping discount logic, and voucher display improvements

entities.name: PetsTable
entities.context: Refactored to remove topper references and consolidate family types

entities.name: Whitelabel cart adapter
entities.context: Optimized to make conditional API calls

entities.name: Statsig
entities.context: Enhanced with OTP attributes for checkout success tracking

entities.name: V2 Cart
entities.context: Integrated for Factor OTP orders with subbrand support

entities.name: RTE (Ready-to-Eat)
entities.context: Subscription filtering and voucher fallback logic added

key_patterns: Feature flag-driven development for gradual rollout of checkout and delivery features
Multi-brand architecture with brand-specific implementations (Factor, GoodChop, pet food)
API integration patterns with conditional execution and readiness checks
Voucher and discount system with type-based display logic (percentage vs dollar)
Analytics instrumentation for tracking OTP and checkout events
Cart architecture evolution with V2 Cart ID and subbrand support
Component consolidation and technical debt reduction (removing deprecated references)
Subscription management with multiple cadence options and delivery filtering
